name: Mini Quad Ski Racing - Fun Jet Ski Racing for Kids
name_original: Mini Quad Ski Racing - Fun Jet Ski Racing for Kids
description:
Vroom, Vroom - are you ready for some adrenaline-pumping action?

Get ready for the Quad Ski racing experience of your life with Mini Quad Ski Racing! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes racing capabilities.

This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

You must use all of your Racing skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.
